Phone the Rand Refineries at (011) 873 2222 and ask for Jewellery sales%0D%0Aon extension 2094.%0D%0A2. Request the price of Gold and Silver per gram including VAT. The Nisaab for Gold is 87.48 grams.%0D%0A3. Minimum Mehr is 30.618 grams of Silver. This is also multiplied by 70c to%0D%0Agive us a value of R21.43.%0D%0A4. Mehr Faatimi is 1530 grams of Silver.
